text:
The documentation says that the "ServerSignature" directive is at "Off" by 
default when actually it's at "On" in the httpd.conf when installed out of  the 
box.
creator: martin.courtemanche@ccra-adrc.gc.ca

text:
That is a misunderstanding. The 'Default' line in the directive description says nothing about the 
shipped httpd.conf. In fact it is the default which is used when the particular directive is entirely 
ommited from the config.

Please have a look at http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/directive-dict.html#Default
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
